ReleaseNotes.ReleaseNote: - shows as a variate in the aircraft selection screen - fuel tank size is now 44 gal per side - does not load aircraft preview on selection screen - does not load into game (I gave up after 10 minutes of waiting)
- include full FUEL_SYSTEM - first working release!
- move to `cardboardgt` namespace - add third row seating to match FSE (6 seats) - add variant to match FSEconomy's 'Cessna 182 Skylane'
- add thumbnails, including EFB plane outline
